Tokens.innerText:
You wake up, floating in the dark. Where are you? When are you? Is this death? You move your arm, and you feel water splash. Oh, sweet. Nah, it’s all good, you’re just floating in a sensory deprivation tank! The hatch is above you. You could probably OPEN it.
[[OPEN ->Garage]]

tokens.text: You wake up, floating in the dark. Where are you? When are you? Is this death? You move your arm, and you feel water splash. Oh, sweet. Nah, it’s all good, you’re just floating in a sensory deprivation tank! The hatch is above you. You could probably OPEN it.

Tokens.innerText: You search the desk, opening all the drawers. There’s a NOTE with a long string of numbers written on it. There’s a tape player, which you could USE to play the TAPE. Other than that, there’s just a bunch of assorted office supplies. Oh, and there’s a GUN.[LOOK]<lo|(set: $look_desk to true)(click: ?lo)[(append: ?c1)[(display: "Look_Logic")]]
Tokens.text: [You search the desk, opening all the drawers. There’s a NOTE with a long string of numbers written on it. There’s a tape player, which you could USE to play the TAPE. Other than that, there’s just a bunch of assorted office supplies. Oh, and there’s a GUN.[LOOK]<lo|(set: $look_desk to true)(click: ?lo)[(append: ?c1)[(display: "Look_Logic")]]]

tokens.text: You search the desk, opening all the drawers. There’s a NOTE with a long string of numbers written on it. There’s a tape player, which you could USE to play the TAPE. Other than that, there’s just a bunch of assorted office supplies. Oh, and there’s a GUN.

Tokens.innerText: (set: $look_shelf to true) The shelves are organized with a sequence of labels reading AA, AB, AC, etc. all the way down to ZZ. As you’re studying the shelves, you notice that someone has left a key FOB on the shelf next to you. (click: ?lo)[(append: ?c1)[(display: "Look_Logic")]]

Tokens.innerText: You need a tape player to play the tape. [USE TAPE]<ut|
Tokens.text: [You need a tape player to play the tape. [USE TAPE]<ut|]

tokens.text: You need a tape player to play the tape.

Tokens.innerText:
You pull the tape player out of the desk drawer and put the audio TAPE inside it. You hit play. A gravelly voice starts talking.
Hello agent, this is your commander. We have sent you to Moscow to infiltrate a research facility that, we believe, is developing a machine that can alter people’s minds. You have been outfitted with the cyborg implant Total Environmental Transcription/Reactive Information Synthesis, or T.E.T./R.I.S., to aid in your mission. It will allow you to quickly analyze your surroundings and determine your best courses of action. To aid you, we have temporarily disabled the facility’s cameras. Good luck.
The tape ends. [USE TAPE]<ut|

Hello agent, this is your commander. We have sent you to Moscow to infiltrate a research facility that, we believe, is developing a machine that can alter people’s minds. You have been outfitted with the cyborg implant Total Environmental Transcription/Reactive Information Synthesis, or T.E.T./R.I.S., to aid in your mission. It will allow you to quickly analyze your surroundings and determine your best courses of action. To aid you, we have temporarily disabled the facility’s cameras. Good luck.
The tape ends. [USE TAPE]<ut|]

You have been outfitted with the cyborg implant Total Environmental Transcription/Reactive Information Synthesis, or T.E.T./R.I.S., to aid in your mission. It will allow you to quickly analyze your surroundings and determine your best courses of action. To aid you, we have temporarily disabled the facility’s cameras. Good luck.

tokens.innerText: You get into the elevator and descend to the lower floor.
tokens.text: [You get into the elevator and descend to the lower floor.]
You get into the elevator and descend to the lower floor.

Tokens.innerText: You try to HACK the elevator, but the power is out and the security barrier is enabled. To use the elevator, you’ll need to turn the power on in the Server Room and disable the security barrier in the Security Room.
Tokens.text: [You try to HACK the elevator, but the power is out and the security barrier is enabled. To use the elevator, you’ll need to turn the power on in the Server Room and disable the security barrier in the Security Room.]

tokens.text: You try to HACK the elevator, but the power is out and the security barrier is enabled. To use the elevator, you’ll need to turn the power on in the Server Room and disable the security barrier in the Security Room.

Tokens.innerText: You try to HACK the keypad next to the door. You don’t get the door open, but you do learn that the password is long, and would be difficult to remember for underpaid guards.
Tokens.text: [You try to HACK the keypad next to the door. You don’t get the door open, but you do learn that the password is long, and would be difficult to remember for underpaid guards.]

tokens.text: You try to HACK the keypad next to the door. You don’t get the door open, but you do learn that the password is long, and would be difficult to remember for underpaid guards.

Tokens.innerText:
You pound on the hatch until it springs open. You haul yourself out of the tank.
You’re in a garage. There is a door to the NORTH, with a keypad next to it. There is a CAMERA in the northwest corner, and another in the northeast. There is a desk with several drawers. You feel something in your pocket. When you check to see what it is, you find an audio TAPE.

Tokens.text: You enter a warehouse. There are shelves of boxes and equipment towering over you. To the NORTH, there is an elevator with no power, sealed with a security door. Next to the elevator is a rack with some white lab COATS on it. To the EAST, there is a door with a sign on it that says “Security Room.” To the WEST, there is a door with a sign on it that says “Server Room.

Tokens.innerText: (if: $look_shelf is true)[(if: $inv's FOB is false)[(set: $inv's FOB to true) You nab the key FOB. This should be able to unlock something.](else:)[You already have the FOB.]](else:)[What fob?][TAKE FOB]<tf| [GET FOB]<tf| (click: ?tf)[(append: ?c1)[(display: "Fob_Logic")]]
